p: Similarly, when comparing LB-04 vs. LB-0 groups (effect of Al stress on S. luteus-inoculated masson pine seedlings), we identified 210 DEPs, including 82 up-regulated and 128 down-regulated proteins in LB-04 ( Table S4). GO annotations ( Figure 1c) identified the main functions of these DEPs as metabolic process, organic substance metabolic process, cellular metabolic process, and primary metabolic process. These DEPs were involved in response to a stimulus, cellular component organization or biology, and localization.
